name: Sonic: Renegade 2: Heroes of Mobius
description:
The Main Description

Sonic: Renegade 2: Heroes of Mobius is the sequel to the still-relevant game, Sonic: Renegade. With new content, new style, you will go crazy on downloading this game!

The Theme

The Theme follows a purple futuristic style, giving it a look like if it was made in 4019.
